Room.Name: The Grinning Sailor Pub
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the bar room of the Grinning Sailor Pub.
Room.LongDescription: Only the youngest and most junior of sailors and pirates drink in this section of the pub. However, it does tend to be crowded and noisy. The main public room is west, through the arched doorway. The Grinning Sailor is a popular hangout for seafaring advneturers when they are in the city of Oceancrest. The owner of this place, Madame Ruthie, also has another business popular with sailors and pirates.
